pageTitle: Deputy Prime Minister’s itinerary for Friday, February 7, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Washington D.C., United States

2:15 p.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will meet with Governor of Maryland and Chair of the National Governors Association, Larry Hogan.

Marriott Marquis
901 Massachusetts Ave. NW

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting.
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 1:45 p.m. in the main lobby.

3:30 p.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will meet with United States Trade Representative Robert Lighthizer.

Closed to Media.

4:00 p.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will meet with United States Trade Representative Robert Lighthizer. She will be joined by the Premier of Saskatchewan, Scott Moe, the Premier of Ontario, Doug Ford, the Premier of Quebec, François Legault, the Premier of New Brunswick, Blaine Higgs, and the Premier of Alberta, Jason Kenney.

Closed to Media.

5:45 p.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Embassy of Canada to the United States

Notes for media:

  • A livestream will be shared at the following link: https://www.facebook.com/connect2canada
  • Open coverage for accredited media.
  • Please contact Diana.Tan@international.gc.ca in advance to obtain accreditation.
